label: Description

value: Alternation of floral stripes and figurative stripes. In the figurative stripes there is an alternation of two scenes, each involving adults playing with a child dressed as a clown. The figurative stripes are offset; the floral stripes are in straight repeat. Black, two reds, blue and yellow ocher. Piece is shaped like a valance.
